story.label: Our Story
story.title: From Humble Beginnings to Industry Leaders
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2009, Level Auto Rental began as a small family business with a simple mission: to provide reliable, affordable transportation solutions for everyone. What started with just five vehicles has grown into one of Moldova's most trusted car rental services.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we've expanded our fleet to include over 500 vehicles ranging from economy cars to luxury sedans and SUVs. Our commitment to customer satisfaction and quality service has remained unchanged, earning us the loyalty of thousands of customers and numerous industry awards.
story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to innovate and improve our services, embracing new technologies and sustainable practices to better serve our customers and protect the environment for future generations.

hero.label: Help Center
hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to common questions about our car rental services. If you can't find what you're looking for, our support team is here to help.

questions.how-to-book: How do I book a car?
questions.modify-cancel: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
questions.account-required: Do I need to create an account to rent a car?
questions.advance-booking: How far in advance should I book a car?

answers.how-to-book: You can book a car directly through our website by selecting your pickup and return dates, choosing a vehicle, and completing the booking form.
answers.modify-cancel: Yes, you can modify or cancel your booking through your account dashboard. Please note that changes may be subject to availability and cancellation policies.
answers.account-required: You can browse without an account, but creating one makes it easier to manage reservations, view history, and speed up future bookings.
answers.advance-booking: We recommend booking at least a few days in advance to secure your preferred car. During peak seasons, earlier bookings are strongly advised.

questions.documents: What documents do I need to rent a car?
questions.additional-driver: Can I add an additional driver?

answers.documents: You'll need a valid driver's license, a government-issued ID (like a passport), and a credit or debit card in the driver's name.
answers.age-requirement: Yes, the minimum age is typically 21 years. Drivers under 25 may be subject to a young driver surcharge.
answers.insurance: Basic insurance is included in all rentals. You can choose additional coverage options for extra protection during the booking process.
answers.additional-driver: Yes, additional drivers can be added at the time of booking or during pickup. All drivers must present a valid license and meet the age requirements.

questions.payment-methods: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.additional-fees: Are there additional fees I should know about?

answers.payment-methods: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, and in some locations, cash. Online payments are processed securely.
answers.deposit: Yes, a refundable security deposit is required at pickup. The amount depends on the vehicle type and rental duration.
answers.additional-fees: Additional fees may apply for late returns, extra mileage, additional drivers, fuel, or special equipment like GPS and child seats.
answers.discounts: Yes, we offer seasonal promotions, loyalty discounts, and corporate rates. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated.

questions.pickup-location: Where can I pick up my rental car?
questions.different-return: Can I return the car to a different location?
questions.late-return: What happens if I return the car late?
questions.refuel: Do I need to refuel the car before returning it?

answers.pickup-location: You can pick up your car at our main office, airport locations, or selected partner stations. Pickup location is chosen during booking.
answers.different-return: Yes, one-way rentals are available between certain locations. An additional fee may apply depending on the distance.
answers.late-return: Late returns may result in additional charges. We recommend contacting us if you anticipate being late to explore flexible options.
answers.refuel: Cars should be returned with the same fuel level as when rented. Otherwise, a refueling charge will apply.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you with any specific questions about our services.
